details.message: CT - Must have one and only one performance period start. Please see the Implementation Guide for information on the performance period here: https://ecqi.healthit.gov/sites/default/files/2020-CMS-QRDA-III-Eligible-Clinicians-and-EP-IG-v1.1-508.pdf#page=17

details.message: CT - A CPC Plus Performance period start must be 01/01/2020. Please refer to the IG for more information here: https://ecqi.healthit.gov/sites/default/files/2020-CMS-QRDA-III-Eligible-Clinicians-and-EP-IG-v1.1-508.pdf#page=14
